radiographic_examinations.findings: Gallbladder wall thickening and gallbladder wall edema with sludge within the lumen; gallbladder is not significantly distended. The hepatic parenchyma appears within normal limits; contour of the liver is smooth; no focal liver mass; the main portal vein is patent with hepatopetal flow; no ascites; no intrahepatic biliary dilation; CHD measures 3 mm; pancreas is not well visualized; spleen has normal echogenicity, measuring 12 cm; limited views of the right kidney show no hydronephrosis; visualized portions of aorta and IVC are within normal limits.
